title: MyPy doesn't like `nav.py` on my machine

labels.name: C-bug
labels.description: Category: this is a bug, deviation, or other problem.

body:
My python version is `Python 3.10.4`. I can work around the problem by deleting `nav.py`. The output of `tox` is:

```
GLOB sdist-make: /home/ptd/Projects/execution-specs/setup.py
py3 inst-nodeps: /home/ptd/Projects/execution-specs/.tox/.tmp/package/1/ethereum-0.1.0.zip
py3 installed: alabaster==0.7.12,asn1crypto==1.5.1,astroid==2.12.2,attrs==21.4.0,Babel==2.10.3,black==22.6.0,certifi==2022.6.15,cffi==1.15.1,charset-normalizer==2.1.0,click==8.1.3,coincurve==17.0.0,coverage==6.4.2,docutils==0.17.1,ethash==0.5.1a1,ethereum @ file:///home/ptd/Projects/execution-specs/.tox/.tmp/package/1/ethereum-0.1.0.zip,execnet==1.9.0,flake8==3.9.2,flake8-bugbear==22.7.1,flake8-docstrings==1.6.0,flake8-spellcheck==0.24.0,idna==3.3,imagesize==1.4.1,iniconfig==1.1.1,isort==5.10.1,Jinja2==3.1.2,lazy-object-proxy==1.7.1,MarkupSafe==2.1.1,mccabe==0.6.1,mypy==0.812,mypy-extensions==0.4.3,packaging==21.3,pathspec==0.9.0,picklebuilder==0.1.0,platformdirs==2.5.2,pluggy==1.0.0,py==1.11.0,pycodestyle==2.7.0,pycparser==2.21,pydocstyle==6.1.1,pyflakes==2.3.1,Pygments==2.12.0,pyparsing==3.0.9,pysha3==1.0.2,pytest==6.2.5,pytest-cov==2.12.1,pytest-forked==1.4.0,pytest-xdist==2.5.0,pytz==2022.1,PyYAML==6.0,requests==2.28.1,rstdiff==0.5.1,rust-pyspec-glue==0.0.5,snowballstemmer==2.2.0,Sphinx==4.2.0,sphinx-autoapi==1.9.0,sphinx-rtd-theme==1.0.0,sphinxcontrib-applehelp==1.0.2,sphinxcontrib-devhelp==1.0.2,sphinxcontrib-htmlhelp==2.0.0,sphinxcontrib-jsmath==1.0.1,sphinxcontrib-qthelp==1.0.3,sphinxcontrib-serializinghtml==1.1.5,toml==0.10.2,tomli==2.0.1,typed-ast==1.4.3,typing_extensions==4.3.0,undocinclude==0.2.1,Unidecode==1.3.4,urllib3==1.26.11,wrapt==1.14.1
py3 run-test-pre: PYTHONHASHSEED='3842494000'
py3 run-test: commands[0] | isort src tests setup.py --check --diff --skip-glob 'tests/fixtures/*'
Skipped 17 files
py3 run-test: commands[1] | black src tests setup.py --check --diff --exclude 'tests/fixtures/*'
All done! ‚ú® üç∞ ‚ú®
778 files would be left unchanged.
py3 run-test: commands[2] | flake8 src tests setup.py
py3 run-test: commands[3] | mypy src tests setup.py --exclude 'tests/fixtures/*' --namespace-packages
src/ethereum_spec_tools/nav.py:217: error: Item "None" of "Optional[BuildEnvironment]" has no attribute "found_docs"
src/ethereum_spec_tools/nav.py:218: error: Item "None" of "Optional[Builder]" has no attribute "get_relative_uri"
Found 2 errors in 1 file (checked 778 source files)
ERROR: InvocationError for command /home/ptd/Projects/execution-specs/.tox/py3/bin/mypy src tests setup.py --exclude 'tests/fixtures/*' --namespace-packages (exited with code 1)
```
